description: This is a Java Spring Boot REST controller class named ProjectsController. It provides CRUD endpoints for managing Project entities, including listing projects with pagination, creating new projects, and retrieving a project by ID. It utilizes Spring annotations for REST mappings, security, and Swagger documentation.

classes.name: ProjectsController
classes.description: REST controller for Project CRUD operations with security roles and pagination.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of projects, sorted by creation date descending.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new project with data validated from the request body.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Fetches a project by its unique ID.
